ingredients.item: 200g pack Heston from Waitrose Caramelised Onion, Bacon & Mustard Gravy
Â½ x 20g pack fresh tarragon, chopped

instructions.step: Slice the potatoes in half lengthways. Place in a pan of water with salt, the rosemary, garlic and cider vinegar. Bring to the boil and reduce to a simmer. Cook until soft (about 20 minutes). Remove the pan from the heat and, using a slotted spoon, remove the potatoes from the water.
Place the potatoes, cut side down, on the barbecue to char on the cut side. Place in a bowl and set aside.

Fry the lardons until golden, drain and reserve the fat. Then pour the gravy in a pan over medium heat, add the cooked lardons, with half of the reserved fat, season with salt and freshly ground pepper. Before serving, add the chopped herbs and shallot and pour in the bowl, over the potatoes.
